summary:
Adds 20 different animal followers to Skyrim, most with their own stable!
They actually count as animal followers; will not interfere with normal follower count.
Does not require any script extenders.
Does not require any DLCs.
descriptionHtml:
Located just south of the College of Winterhold (see map).
Each creature counts as an animal follower - will not interfere with your normal follower count.
Creatures have 3 basic options: Follow, Wait, and Dismiss.
Dismissing a creature will cause it to return to The Zoo.
When you first talk to your creature, it will seem like nothing happened - this is wrong.
When you move around, they should follow you (barring any of their own animations).
If you first tell a creature to wait, AND THEN dismiss it, it will wait until you tell it otherwise, or three days have passed.

Enjoy!
author: ordersomething
